Reviews.Title: “Perfect Location, clean, comfortable”
Reviews.Author: bchrist12
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights oct 8 12 2010 hotel totally renovated earlier reviews roomsbathrooms clean compared average european standards beds little stiff sort foam mattress overall comfortable ac october safe despite advertised staff speaks english breakfast depending book included pretty simple croissant bun coffee quick start morning sorry forgot pictures inside windows help street noise weekend little noisy free wireless internet signal pretty low cut stay staff front desk 247 location location location look street front door spanish steps 5 min walk pantheon 5 min walk piazza di fiori 15 min walk colosseumforum 15 min walk
